document.docAuthor: Barreto-Triana, Nancy, Ferreira, Paulo Sergio F., Osorio-Mejía, Pablo Andrés & Fiuza Ferreira, Luciano S.
document.masterDocTitle: Plant bugs (Hemiptera: Miridae) associated with pastures in Colombia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Plant bugs (Hemiptera: Miridae) associated with pastures in Colombia

subSubSection.paragraph: Diagnosis: General color dark; head entirely black on sides and ventral usually with distinct V-shaped pale stripe behind posterior margin of eyes; cuneus mostly dark; endosoma with row of about six thick spines apically, and a small field of spicules just basad to secondary gonopore.

Plant associations: Poaceae :
Echinocloa colonum, Eleusine indica, Digitaria sanguinalis , Panicum maximum , Pennisetum clandestinum
( Martínez & Barreto 1998 ;
Morales et al. 2016
),
Holcus lanatus , Phalaris tuberinacea
synonimus of
P. arudinacea
(new record from specimens labels).

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 9–12.
Collaria scenica
: (9) habitus (dorsal view). 10–12: male genitália: (10) aedeagus; (11) left paramere; (12) right paramere (redrawn from Carvalho & Fontes, 1981).
